languages.text: "Настоятель Инокрант не участвует в диспуте ввиду отсутствия ораторского таланта. Но на совете братии он высказал интересную мысль — предложить Эксплораторам запустить Горнило, чтобы доказать, что оно принадлежит им. Есть обоснованные сомнения, что они смогут сделать это — реликвия слишком стара".

"Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."
languages.original_text: "Настоятель Инокрант не участвует в диспуте ввиду отсутствия ораторского таланта. Но на совете братии он высказал интересную мысль — предложить Эксплораторам запустить Горнило, чтобы доказать, что оно принадлежит им. Есть обоснованные сомнения, что они смогут сделать это — реликвия слишком стара".

traits.locale_text: "Abbot Enocrat is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the brotherhood, he had raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start up the Crucible to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

"Abbot Enocrat is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the brotherhood, he had raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start up the Crucible to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

"Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the brotherhood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

"Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

"Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

languages.text: “伊诺柯兰特教长由于缺乏演讲才能，无法参与这场争论，但在修会的会议上，他提出了一个有趣的观点——让开拓者启动熔炉，以此证明这是他们的合法遗产。不过，我们有理由怀疑开拓者能不能启动熔炉，毕竟……这件圣物实在是太古老了。”
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

traits.locale_text: “伊诺柯兰特教长由于缺乏演讲才能，无法参与这场争论，但在修会的会议上，他提出了一个有趣的观点——让开拓者启动熔炉，以此证明这是他们的合法遗产。不过，我们有理由怀疑开拓者能不能启动熔炉，毕竟……这件圣物实在是太古老了。”

languages.text: «El prelado Inocrant no participa en la disputa debido a su falta de talento oratorio, pero, en el consejo con la hermandad, planteó un punto interesante: proponer a los exploradores activar el Crisol para demostrar sus orígenes legítimos. Sin embargo, no es seguro que puedan hacerlo: la reliquia es demasiado antigua».
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

traits.locale_text: «El prelado Inocrant no participa en la disputa debido a su falta de talento oratorio, pero, en el consejo con la hermandad, planteó un punto interesante: proponer a los exploradores activar el Crisol para demostrar sus orígenes legítimos. Sin embargo, no es seguro que puedan hacerlo: la reliquia es demasiado antigua».

languages.text: 「上級聖職者のイノクラントは演説の才能に乏しいため、論争には参加していません。しかし、聖職との協議会で、彼は興味深い点を提起したのです...自分たちの正当な遺宝であることを証明するために、エクスプロレイターたちに坩堝を起動するよう提案したのです。だが、そうできるかどうかについては、疑問を抱くのも無理はない...その遺宝があまりにも古いためです」
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

traits.locale_text: 「上級聖職者のイノクラントは演説の才能に乏しいため、論争には参加していません。しかし、同胞団との協議会で、彼は興味深い点を提起したのです...自分たちの正当な遺宝であることを証明するために、エクスプロレイターたちに坩堝を起動するよう提案したのです。だが、そうできるかどうかについては、疑問を抱くのも無理はない...その遺宝があまりにも古いためです」
「上級聖職者のイノクラントは演説の才能に乏しいため、論争には参加していません。しかし、同胞団との協議会で、彼は興味深い点を提起したのです...自分たちの正当な遺宝であることを証明するために、エクスプロレイターたちに坩堝を起動するよう提案したのです。だが、そうできるかどうかについては、疑問を抱くのも無理はない...その遺宝があまりにも古いためです」

languages.text: « Le prélat Inocrant, dont l'absence de talent d'orateur est notoire, a préféré ne pas participer aux débats. Il a toutefois émis une suggestion intéressante lors d'une assemblée avec le clergé : il s'agirait de proposer aux Explorators d'activer le Creuset afin de prouver la légitimité de leurs revendications. La relique étant trop ancienne, on peut raisonnablement penser qu'ils n'y parviendront pas. »
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

traits.locale_text: « Le prélat Inocrant, dont l'absence de talent d'orateur est notoire, a préféré ne pas participer aux débats. Il a toutefois émis une suggestion intéressante lors d'une assemblée avec la confrérie : il s'agirait de proposer aux Explorators d'activer le Creuset afin de prouver la légitimité de leurs revendications. La relique étant trop ancienne, on peut raisonnablement penser qu'ils n'y parviendront pas. »

languages.text: "Prälat Inocrant nimmt ob seines Mangels an rednerischem Talent nicht an dem Disput teil. Doch bei den Beratungen mit seiner Priesterschaft hat er etwas Interessantes gesagt: Man könnte den Exploratoren vorschlagen, den Tiegel zu starten, um zu beweisen, dass er rechtmäßig ihr Erbe ist. Es gibt allerdings berechtigte Zweifel, ob ihnen das gelingen kann ... die Reliquie ist zu alt."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."

traits.locale_text: "Prälat Inocrant nimmt ob seines Mangels an rednerischem Talent nicht an dem Disput teil. Doch bei den Beratungen mit seiner Priesterschaft hat er etwas Interessantes gesagt: Man könnte den Exploratoren vorschlagen, den Tiegel zu starten, um zu beweisen, dass er rechtmäßig ihr Erbe ist. Es gibt allerdings berechtigte Zweifel, ob ihnen das gelingen kann ... die Reliquie ist zu alt."

"Prälat Inocrant nimmt ob seines Mangels an rednerischem Talent nicht an dem Disput teil. Doch bei den Beratungen mit seiner Bruderschaft hat er etwas Interessantes gesagt: Man könnte den Exploratoren vorschlagen, den Tiegel zu starten, um zu beweisen, dass er rechtmäßig ihr Erbe ist. Es gibt jedoch berechtigte Zweifel, ob ihnen das gelingen kann — die Reliquie ist zu alt."

languages.text: "Piskopos İnocrant, hitabet becerisi yoksunluğundan dolayı bu tartışmaya katılmıyor. Ancak rahiplik ile yaptığı konsey toplantısında ilginç bir konuya dikkat çekti. Keşiftörlerin hakiki vâris olduklarını kanıtlamaları için Pota'yı başlatmalarını öneriyor. Ancak haklı olarak bunu başarabileceklerine dair bir kuşku bulunuyor... Yadigâr, oldukça eski."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Inocrant is not participating in the dispute due to his lack of oratory talent. But at the council with the priesthood, he raised an interesting point — proposing to the Explorators to start the Crucible in order to prove their rightful heritage. There is reasonable doubt that they will be able to do so, however — the relic is too old."
